hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Jail Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #the Ice Cavern#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Zora Scale#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.
